gt_metadata.note: Freeform Stacking: Leah reviews entire document including CP redlines. Representing party is SAME as Freeform Baseline.

part_a_cp_redlines.original_text: Licensor shall indemnify, defend, and hold harmless Licensee from and against any third-party claims arising from infringement of intellectual property rights by the Software.
part_a_cp_redlines.cp_redline: Each party shall indemnify, defend, and hold harmless the other party from and against any third-party claims.
part_a_cp_redlines.example_revision: Revert to baseline: IP-specific indemnification from Licensor. Reject generic mutual indemnification that removes IP protection.
key_elements: 1) IP infringement indemnification from Licensor 2) Not watered down to generic mutual indemnity 3) Protects Licensee from Software IP claims
acceptable_variations: May clarify: scope of covered IP rights
May add: carve-outs for Licensee modifications
unacceptable_responses: Licensee indemnifying Licensor for Software IP
part_a_cp_redlines.reasoning_must_address: Licensor provides Software, should indemnify IP claims; mutual generic indemnity removes critical protection

part_a_cp_redlines.original_text: Licensor's total liability shall not exceed the Subscription Fees paid by Licensee in the twelve (12) months preceding the claim.
part_a_cp_redlines.cp_redline: Licensor's total liability shall not exceed $50,000.
part_a_cp_redlines.example_revision: Revert to baseline: 12-month fees cap. Reject fixed $50K cap that may be inadequate for substantial subscriptions.
key_elements: 1) Cap tied to 12-month fees 2) Proportional to contract value 3) No arbitrary low fixed cap
acceptable_variations: May add: carve-outs for IP, data breach, wilful misconduct
part_a_cp_redlines.reasoning_must_address: $50K fixed cap inadequate for enterprise subscriptions; cap should scale with fees paid

part_a_cp_redlines.original_text: Either party may terminate upon 30 days notice if other party materially breaches and fails to cure within 30 days.
part_a_cp_redlines.cp_redline: Licensor may terminate immediately upon material breach. Licensee may terminate if Licensor fails to cure breach within 60 days notice.
part_a_cp_redlines.example_revision: Revert to baseline: Symmetric 30-day cure period for both parties. Reject asymmetric provision favouring Licensor.
key_elements: 1) Equal cure periods 2) Minimum 30 days for both parties 3) No immediate termination without cure opportunity
acceptable_variations: May differentiate: immediate for security breaches, 30 days for others
unacceptable_responses: No cure opportunity for Licensee breaches
part_a_cp_redlines.reasoning_must_address: Asymmetry unfairly favours Licensor; both parties need reasonable cure opportunity

part_a_cp_redlines.original_text: Neither party may assign this Agreement without the other party's prior written consent, except Licensee may assign to affiliates or in connection with merger or acquisition.
part_a_cp_redlines.cp_redline: Licensee may not assign this Agreement in connection with change of control without Licensor consent. Violation of this Section shall constitute material breach.
part_a_cp_redlines.example_revision: Revert to baseline: Licensee may assign to affiliates or in M&A transactions. Reject restriction on M&A assignments.
key_elements: 1) Licensee M&A assignment rights preserved 2) No consent required for change of control 3) Not a material breach
acceptable_variations: May add: notice requirement for M&A (not consent)
unacceptable_responses: Requiring Licensor consent for change of control
part_a_cp_redlines.reasoning_must_address: M&A restrictions block business transactions; Licensee must have change-of-control flexibility

part_b_whole_document.note: Part B uses the Freeform Baseline GT. Same contract, same issues. Evaluate whether Leah still detects these risks when CP redlines are present.

part_c_document_quality.scope: Every redline Leah produces in the output .docx

per_redline_capture.linked_gt_id: GT ID if NEW_REDLINE addresses Part B issue, else null
per_redline_capture.action_executed: ACCEPT | MODIFY | REJECT | ADD | DELETE | NONE
per_redline_capture.insertion_accuracy: 0-2 | NA (aligned pair average, NA for DELETE/simple swaps)

aggregation_rules.quality_fields: Averaged across evaluations; median used for divergent scores
